## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r loadingData, echo=TRUE}

if (!("activity.csv" %in% dir())){
  unzip("activity.zip")
  print("descompactou")
}
actData <- read.csv("activity.csv",
                    header = TRUE,
                    colClasses = c("numeric", "Date", "numeric"),
                    na.strings = "NA")

```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
